column2: Grubb and Burrowes was a notary firm in the Shire led by two Grubbs and one Burrowes. They were probably lawyers or auctioneers.
Grubb and Burrowes oversaw the auction of Bilbo Baggins estate after the hobbit went missing in .

column1: 2014: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies:
:Tosser Grubb leads the auction on behalf of the firm.
